text: Simona Halep (born 27 September 1991 in Constanța, Romania) is a professional tennis player from Romania. She was the winner of the 2018 French Open.Simona Halep beats Sloane Stephens to win French Open title The Guardian Retrieved 9 August 2018 Halep is currently ranked number one in the world.Player Bio at WTA Retrieved 9 August 2018 ==Career statistics== ===Grand Slam singles performance timeline=== Tournament 2010 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017 2018 SR W–L Win % Grand Slam tournaments Australian Open Q1 3R 1R 1R QF QF 1R 1R F 0 / 8 16–8 French Open 1R 2R 1R 1R F 2R 4R F W 1 / 9 24–8 Wimbledon Q2 2R 1R 2R SF 1R QF QF 3R 0 / 8 17–8 US Open 1R 2R 2R 4R 3R SF QF 1R 0 / 8 16–8 Win–Loss 0–2 5–4 1–4 4–4 17–4 10–4 11–4 10–4 15–2 1 / 33 73–32 ===Doubles performance timeline=== Tournament 2011 2012 2013 2014 2015 SR W–L Win % Grand Slam tournaments Australian Open 1R 1R 1R 1R A 0 / 4 0–4 French Open 1R 2R 1R A A 0 / 3 1–2 Wimbledon 1R 1R 1R A 1R 0 / 4 0–4 US Open 2R 1R 1R A A 0 / 3 1–3 Win–Loss 1–4 1–3 0–4 0–1 0–1 0 / 14 2–13 ===Mixed=== Tournament 2015 SR W–L Win% Australian Open A 0 / 0 0–0 0% French Open A 0 / 0 0–0 0% Wimbledon A 0 / 0 0–0 0% US Open QF 0 / 1 2–0 100% Win–Loss 2–0 0–0 2–0 100% ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Female tennis players
